Package me.recsfor.search

Classes in this package provide functionality to retrieve data used for generating search results and group pages using the appropriate API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractQuery
    Contains basic functionality for how a query should be modeled.
    AlbumQuery
    Uses MusicBrainz (https://musicbrainz.org/ws/2/) to gather data for albums, EP's, singles, and other types for search result and group pages.
    ArtistQuery
    Uses MusicBrainz (https://musicbrainz.org/ws/2/) to gather data for artist search result and group pages.
    MovieQuery
    Uses the OMDb API (https://omdbapi.com) to gather data for movie/TV show search result and group pages.
    QueryBean
    JavaBeans component to delegate queries to the proper class.

Package me.recsfor.search Description

Classes in this package provide functionality to retrieve data used for generating search results and group pages using the appropriate API. These classes can be interacted with from the frontend in search.jsp where a QueryBean is instantiated.
